alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:56PM EDT until April 15 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Hunterdon County in northwestern New Jersey... Central Bucks County in southeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 455 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Doylestown, or 18 miles west of Trenton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Doylestown, Byram, Chalfont, Tinicum, New Hope, Frenchtown, Stockton, Sergeantsville, Pipersville, Erwinna, Gardenville, Lumberville, Sand Brook, Lambertville, New Britain and Brittany Farms-Highlands. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
